entries.journal_entry_description: The Empire needs raw materials to complete their base in Restuss. They have ordered you to supply them with 500 units of obsidian ore from the Kessel system.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: The Empire has ordered you to mine 500 units of obsidian ore in the Kessel system.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You have completed the mission in the Kessel system. You should return to Lieutenant Wholding in Restuss and give him the ore.
